txt.en:
At first glance, this looks like a piece of worthless jewellery, but upon further inspection you discovered an inscription engraved on the back of the pendant. 

'I will ever and always love you.

- D'

Beneath this inscription is carved a symbol of the Eglain. Perhaps someone of the Eglain can assist you with finding the owner of this necklace?

Daegwalt's face contorts briefly in a look of anguish, before he fights back the pain and issues a smile.

'This is my wife's. I gave it to her before we came to live with the Eglain. It was lost when she was struck down at Naerost. 

'You have given me something that I cannot truly repay, but I will give you something of import to me in an effort to repay you.'
While hunting down the half-orcs, you discovered a necklace bearing an inscription and the mark of the Eglain.
Collected the necklace of Daegwalt's wife
Deliver the necklace to its rightful owner
You discovered a necklace upon one of the half-orcs in the central Lone-lands. Perhaps you can ask some of the Eglain if they know who the true owner of the necklace could be.
Deliver the necklace to its rightful owner
